con:testCase.name: RC04-InvalidCreditorBankIdentifier
con:testCase.con:description: TC will create Error Codes for RC04-InvalidCreditorBankIdentifier

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='${Properties#bankId}' and length(customerID)='11' and ROWNUM=1

con:config.con:query: SELECT TRANSACTIONSID , ENDTOENDID , PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, ISPC , FK_PROCESSINGLINEID FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE ENDTOENDID LIKE '%${Properties#MsgID}%' and PAYMENTSTATUS = 'REJC'

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <Results> <ResultSet fetchSize="10"> <Row rowNumber="1"> <STATUSREASONADDTINFID>55003</STATUSREASONADDTINFID> <FK_STATUSREASONID>54278</FK_STATUSREASONID> <ADDITIONALINFORMATION>Creditor agent identification is missing</ADDITIONALINFORMATION> </Row> </ResultSet> </Results>
